name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a skilled Senior System Engineer with a robust background in **cloud infrastructure** including **AWS** and **Azure**, I excel in implementing **DevOps**, **CI/CD**, and **GitOps** practices to optimize software delivery and performance. My expertise encompasses **API** development with **gRPC** and **ReST**, and I have a comprehensive understanding of **networking**, including the usage of **openflow** and **open_virtual_switch** for efficient data flow management. I leverage **Kubernetes** to orchestrate containerized applications, improving scalability and resilience in systems. 
With 8 years of experience in full-stack development, I have successfully integrated technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** to create high-performance solutions in healthcare and finance. My strong foundation in microservices architecture and event-driven systems allows me to develop advanced applications that align with compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. I also possess hands-on experience in developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools like MLflow, Airflow, and Kubeflow, reinforcing my capability to enhance operational efficiency through intelligent automation and analytics.
